name: google-docs-sync
description: Sync Google Docs with Markdown files - CLI and Obsidian plugin

scripts.build: bun run check && bun run build:unsafe
scripts.build:unsafe: bun run build:cli && bun run build:plugin
scripts.build:plugin: bun build src/plugin-main.ts --outdir ./dist --external obsidian --format cjs --target browser && mv dist/plugin-main.js dist/main.js && cp manifest.json styles.css dist/
scripts.package:plugin: bun run clean:plugin && bun run build:plugin && bun run package:plugin-zip
scripts.package:plugin-zip: mkdir -p dist/plugin-package && cp dist/main.js dist/manifest.json dist/styles.css dist/plugin-package/ && cd dist/plugin-package && cd .. && zip -r plugin.zip plugin-package/
scripts.test:unit: bun test src/unit.test.ts src/error-handling.test.ts src/auth/auth.test.ts src/cli_utils.test.ts src/yaml-parsing.test.ts src/deps.test.ts src/real-implementation.test.ts src/fs/ignore.test.ts src/fs/frontmatter.test.ts src/main.test.ts
scripts.test:contracts: bun test src/tests/api-contract.test.ts src/tests/plugin-workflows.test.ts src/tests/api-gap-detector.test.ts src/tests/mock-vs-real.test.ts src/tests/type-contracts.test.ts
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test:coverage && bun run format:check

author: google-docs-sync team
